page.title: 16COASTGUARD RESCUE STATION
page.content: { THE STATION }The coastguard rescue station in Beck lane Easington it is a two storey brick building.The top floor is like a class room with desks and chairs for fourteen people,there is also a blackboard and teaching aids. {EQUIPMENT}Below is a store with rocket equipment,lighting genorators and water proofs for 12 men. {CARPARK}Behind the building is a marine rescue unit consisting of one landrover with rescue equipment and there is room for another two landrovers,and one affical vehicle which is a vauxall Astra estate.
